segment.src_text: 然后这个，当然咱画的不好看了。然后呢，这个呃署上名字，然后某年某月某日我临摹的，
segment.trg_text: Of course, my painting skill is not so good. Then, I sign my name and date of creation.

utterance.sub_src_text: 然后这个，当然咱画的不好看了。
utterance.sub_trg_text: Of course, my painting skill is not so good.

utterance.sub_src_text: 然后呢，这个呃署上名字，
utterance.sub_trg_text: Then, I sign my name

utterance.sub_src_text: 然后某年某月某日我临摹的，
utterance.sub_trg_text: and date of creation.

segment.src_text: 这个画儿也可以卖钱啊，这事算不算侵权呢？啊，这个事它其实也不算，对吧？
segment.trg_text: This painting can be sold for profit. Is this infringement? This actually isn't either.

utterance.sub_src_text: 这个画儿也可以卖钱啊，
utterance.sub_trg_text: This painting can be sold for profit.

utterance.sub_src_text: 这事算不算侵权呢？
utterance.sub_trg_text: Is this infringement?

utterance.sub_src_text: 啊，这个事它其实也不算，对吧？
utterance.sub_trg_text: This actually isn't either.

segment.src_text: 我们对这种方式，啊，也是比较宽容地说啊，这个人呃很努力地去向大师学习去了。对吧？
segment.trg_text: We are relatively tolerant of this way and consider that the person is just actively seeking to learn from masters.

utterance.sub_src_text: 我们对这种方式，啊，也是比较宽容地说啊，
utterance.sub_trg_text: We are relatively tolerant of this way

utterance.sub_src_text: 这个人呃很努力地去向大师学习去了。对吧？
utterance.sub_trg_text: and consider that the person is just actively seeking to learn from masters.

segment.src_text: 那你说我这个达芬奇已经过世很久了吧？我临摹一个现在还活着人的这个图画行不行呢？
segment.trg_text: Then you may say that Da Vinci has passed away for a long time, but can I copy the drawing of someone who is still alive?

utterance.sub_src_text: 那你说我这个达芬奇已经过世很久了吧？
utterance.sub_trg_text: Then you may say that Da Vinci has passed away for a long time,

utterance.sub_src_text: 我临摹一个现在还活着人的这个图画行不行呢？
utterance.sub_trg_text: but can I copy the drawing of someone who is still alive?

segment.src_text: 其实也行吧，也没有说怎么就不行对吧？这个其实也没有什么问题。
segment.trg_text: Actually, it's admitted too. This actually has no problem.

utterance.sub_src_text: 其实也行吧，也没有说怎么就不行对吧？
utterance.sub_trg_text: Actually, it's admitted too.

utterance.sub_src_text: 这个其实也没有什么问题。
utterance.sub_trg_text: This actually has no problem.

segment.src_text: 那么按照某个特定的风格重新创作算什么呢？就像刚才我讲的啊，我按照这个宫崎骏的风格又重画了一幅画。这个事儿算抄袭吗？
segment.trg_text: How about recreating based on a certain style? As what I just said, I redraw a picture based on the style of Hayao Miyazaki. Is this considered plagiarism?

utterance.sub_src_text: 那么按照某个特定的风格重新创作算什么呢？
utterance.sub_trg_text: How about recreating based on a certain style?

utterance.sub_src_text: 就像刚才我讲的啊，
utterance.sub_trg_text: As what I just said,

utterance.sub_src_text: 我按照这个宫崎骏的风格又重画了一幅画。
utterance.sub_trg_text: I redraw a picture based on the style of Hayao Miyazaki.

utterance.sub_src_text: 这个事儿算抄袭吗？
utterance.sub_trg_text: Is this considered plagiarism?

segment.src_text: 啊，或者说这个风格它本身能够注册成专利，或者注册成一个什么东西可以进行保护吗？
segment.trg_text: Or can this style itself be registered as a patent of some form of protection?

utterance.sub_src_text: 啊，或者说这个风格它本身能够注册成专利，
utterance.sub_trg_text: Or can this style itself be registered as a patent

utterance.sub_src_text: 或者注册成一个什么东西可以进行保护吗？
utterance.sub_trg_text: of some form of protection?

segment.src_text: 这也不行对吧？大家也是说诶，你画的像啊，这个叫做啊宫崎骏啊，那你只能说是这个什么呢？
segment.trg_text: It cannot either. People may say, your drawing is similar to Hayao Miyazaki's works. Then what can this be considered?

utterance.sub_src_text: 这也不行对吧？
utterance.sub_trg_text: It cannot either.

utterance.sub_src_text: 大家也是说诶，
utterance.sub_trg_text: People may say,

utterance.sub_src_text: 你画的像啊，这个叫做啊宫崎骏啊，
utterance.sub_trg_text: your drawing is similar to Hayao Miyazaki's works.

utterance.sub_src_text: 那你只能说是这个什么呢？
utterance.sub_trg_text: Then what can this be considered?

segment.src_text: 啊，你这个向宫崎骏老爷子致敬了，对吧？
segment.trg_text: You can say that you have paid tribute to Mr. Hayao Miyazaki.

utterance.sub_src_text: 啊，你这个向宫崎骏老爷子致敬了，对吧？
utterance.sub_trg_text: You can say that you have paid tribute to Mr. Hayao Miyazaki.

segment.src_text: 他也不会说你这就是一个啊叫做啊抄袭对吧？
segment.trg_text: He won't regard it as plagiarism either.

utterance.sub_src_text: 他也不会说你这就是一个啊叫做啊抄袭对吧？
utterance.sub_trg_text: He won't regard it as plagiarism either.
